title: Ore ga Suki nano wa Imouto dakedo Imouto ja Nai - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Incest   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Otaku   R-15   Sister Complex   Stalkers
author: Ebisu Seiji   恵比須 清司
description: Nagami Suzuka is a beautiful third-year middle school student who has excellent grades and is the student council president. She wrote a novel about a little sister who dotes on her big brother, and the novel wins a light novel award. After they discuss the matter, Yuu, her big brother, is the one who debuts as a proxy light novel author instead of Suzuka under the pen name Towano Chikai (Eternal Promise).>
